ah... forget the previous mail i sent... hehe... didnt read this one b4 i
send out the last... then i supose i dont need to spend all day nuking

> From: "Ebon Praetor" <kelc@...>
>
> > When one of them hit 51, the rest of them will not increase anymore?
> i believe ziltus ask this question b4... but since i have one of them
> in the 40s, i should know bout it and start working on something,
> otherwise the rest will not increase anymore... so ziltus dont tell
> me u just spend one bloody day do nothing but just keep casting
> spells?
>
> When one specialisation hits 51, the rest will not increase
> BEYOND 50. They will still increase if below 50, but will cap out at
> 50.
>
> The one that hits 51 first will go on to your level cap.
>
>
